column2: Description
Prize: Thing most people want to touch.
Make the quickest and best quick-change outfit
Build the highest cardboard box tower.
Work out the circumference of a caravan in baked beans.
Live: Make the most exotic fruit hat, you may only touch the fruit using the grabbers.

column1: Episode 2: My eyes are circles. (12 September 2018)

column2: Prize: Boldest belt.
Write a ten word story while running to a finish line. Fastest person with a complete story wins.
Team: The blindfolded person must paint the best still life while the others guide, using only the words on the card.

Predict what one of the other contestants (specified) will do with the objects presented. You must then perform an action, in the hope that a third contestant (specified, different) will predict what you do.
Draw the biggest and best circle.
Live: Build the highest can tower while inside a hoop. Highest can tower 10 seconds after the whistle wins.
Guess the number on Alex's left forearm.

column1: Episode 3: Twelve blush majesty two. (19 September 2018)

column2: Prize: Best thing from the 90's.
Excite Alex. Greatest increase in heart rate wins.
Make the best noise. You must begin with 'This is my best noise'. You must remain silent for 10 seconds after your noise. You have one attempt.
Get the ball into the hole in as few strokes as possible, without carrying it, only by striking it.
Live: Write a ten word fact.

column1: Live: Silently mouth your fact to Greg. Most words understood wins.

column2: Prize: Most confusing thing.
Work out what the switch does. Do not take the switch out of the room.
Dramatically alter your appearance using the items in the case. You have five minutes to inspect the case, and your alterations must occur between when the lift doors close and when they reopen.
Make the scales read exactly 31.770kg for at least five seconds.
Live: Correctly wear the most additional items of clothing while handcuffed.
Make the best paper plane from loo roll. Furthest flight wins.
Prize: Worst gift from a named relative.
Deliver the task in the most spectacular way to Alex.
Make the most white circles on the target behind the line. The task is everyone vs Phil. Phil has 20 minutes, the others have 5 minutes.
Cheer up this former traffic warden.
Team: Make yourselves appear as big or as small as possible.
Team Live: Place an object on the hanger alternately, with no more than 20 seconds. Whoever makes it fall loses.
Prize: Best key.
Put exactly 50 different things in this bin. The time starts when Alex touches your shoulder and ends once you declare there are 50 things in the bin.

column1: Using all the items from your bin, make the best picture of the Taskmaster.

column2: Team: Write and perform the most suspenseful soap opera cliffhanger, lasting at most one minute.
Select a box, and without breaking any, place the 10 pairs of glasses (implied to be spectacles, but actually drinking glasses) into it. Smallest box wins. You may not change box afterwards.
Live: Get your doughnut as high as possible, while holding hands with the people beside you. Should any doughnut be midair after the time, the height will be measured from its landing position.
Prize: Most exciting thing beginning with G.
Throw something into the bin in the other side of the fence. You may not use ladders or touch the fence, and you must stay that side of the fence.
Don't blink. Your time starts in 10 seconds.
Team: Make the best extension to the Taskmaster house.
Make the best Christmas cracker.
Live: Hit the drum on stage in exactly 9.58 seconds.

column1: Bonus: Most magnificent walk toward the drum.
Episode 8: Mother honks her horn. (24 October 2018)

column2: Prize: Creepiest thing.
Poke the most unexpected thing through the hole in the roof of the grotto.
Puzzle: C. Now look in the microwave (End task: Scream).
Compose the best 30 second piece of music.

Live:  Bob when you hear the surname of a famous Bob. Pat when you hear the surname of a famous Pat. Kneel when you hear the surname of a famous Neil. Stew when you hear the surname of a famous Stu. Wane when you hear the surname of a famous Wayne.

column1: Episode 9: The pendulum draws the eye. (31 October 2018)

column2: Prize: Most surprisingly beautiful thing.
Put the most money in the floating bowl without touching it or making it sink. You must also say your name at least once every 30 seconds.
Take a photo of yourself wearing this fez in the most unusual situation.
Hula.

column1: Live: Improve upon your hula-ing. Biggest improvement wins.

column2: Find the sock containing a satsuma. You may not look inside any sock. You can squeeze 5, strike 10, sniff 20, put your hand inside 3 and your foot inside 11.
Team: Rally to exactly 24. You must be at least 6ft 8in apart, and perform an equal number of shots.
Live: Write your name and draw a happy horse - the horse must be drawn upside down and you may not rotate your canvas.

column1: Episode 10: I can hear it gooping. (7 November 2018)

column2: Prize: Most magnificent stationery.
In a future task, when you hear the siren sound, put on a boiler suit and lie on the ground. Until then, you may not touch a boiler suit.
Find the hard-boiled egg. You may touch two eggs, and damage two eggs, but you may not damage the boiled egg.
Physically recreate a classic video game.
Tie yourself up as securely as possible. **Siren sounds**
Live: Poke the person in front of you with either a sausage or a finger. If they guess incorrectly, they will be eliminated.
